mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer(company_cd, cus_cd, title, reg_cd, domain, fax, ceo_name, ceo_phone, ceo_email, worker_name, worker_phone, worker_email, memo, ent_id, entdate, ent_prog, mod_id, mod_date, mod_prog) VALUES(#{company_cd}, #{cus_cd}, #{title}, #{reg_cd}, #{domain}, #{fax}, #{ceo_name}, #{ceo_phone}, #{ceo_email}, #{worker_name}, #{worker_phone}, #{worker_email}, #{memo}, #{ent_id}, NOW(), #{ent_prog}, #{mod_id}, NOW(), #{mod_prog})
mapper.select: SELECT cus_cd, title, ceo_name, memo FROM customer WHERE 1=1 AND company_cd = #{company_cd} AND cus_cd LIKE '%${searchParam}%' OR title LIKE '%${searchParam}%' OR ceo_name LIKE '%${searchParam}%' OR memo LIKE '%${searchParam}%' ORDER BY cus_cd ASC
